innerAbility.name: For Bossing
abilities: Chance to Skip Cooldown +10% OR Boss Damage +10%

innerAbility.name: For Training
abilities: Number of enemies hit by multi-target skill +1

build: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/standard-magic-guard.png} tip={Standard Magic Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/light-speed.png} tip={Light Speed}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/mana-well.png} tip={Mana Well}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/flash-shower.png} tip={Flash Shower}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/abyssal-drop.png} tip={Abyssal Drop}>

<tt src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/black-blessing.png} tip={Black Blessing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sylvan-lance.png} tip={Sylvan Lance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/pressure-void.png} tip={Pressure Void}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/blinding-pillar.png} tip={Blinding Pillar}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/self-recovery.png} tip={Self Recovery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/dusk-guard.png} tip={Dusk Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/shadow-shell.png} tip={Shadow Shell}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/photic-meditation.png} tip={Photic Meditation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/spectral-light.png} tip={Spectral Light}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/moonlight-spear.png} tip={Moonlight Spear}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/death-scythe.png} tip={Death Scythe}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ray-of-redemption.png} tip={Ray of Redemption}>

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/darkness-mastery.png} tip={Darkness Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/magic-mastery.png} tip={Magic Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/arcane-pitch.png} tip={Arcane Pitch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/twilight-nova-1.png} tip={Twilight Nova}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/dark-crescendo.png} tip={Dark Crescendo}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection.png} tip={Reflection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/apocalypse.png} tip={Apocalypse}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender.png} tip={Ender}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: [For Bossing]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection-reinforce.png} tip={Reflection - Reinforce}> Reflection - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/apocalypse-reinforce.png} tip={Apocalypse - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/apocalypse-recharge.png} tip={Apocalypse - Recharge}> Apocalypse - Reinforce and Recharge_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender-reinforce.png} tip={Ender - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender-range-up.png} tip={Ender - Range Up}> Ender - Reinforce and Range Up_>[For Training]<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection-reinforce.png} tip={Reflection - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection-spread.png} tip={Reflection - Spread}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection-range-up.png} tip={Reflection - Range Up}> Reflection - Reinforce, Spread, and Range Up_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/apocalypse-recharge.png} tip={Apocalypse - Recharge}> Apocalypse - Recharge_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender-reinforce.png} tip={Ender - Reinforce}> Ender - Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection.png} tip={Reflection (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/twilight-nova-1.png} tip={Twilight Nova (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/apocalypse.png} tip={Apocalypse (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender.png} tip={Ender (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good

3 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_Each skill above should appear in 2 nodes_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/flash-shower.png} tip={Flash Shower / Abyssal Drop (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sylvan-lance.png} tip={Sylvan Lance (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/pressure-void.png} tip={Pressure Void (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/spectral-light.png} tip={Spectral Light (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ray-of-redemption.png} tip={Ray of Redemption (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/moonlight-spear.png} tip={Moonlight Spear (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/death-scythe.png} tip={Death Scythe (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/reflection.png} tip={Reflection (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/twilight-nova-1.png} tip={Twilight Nova (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/apocalypse.png} tip={Apocalypse (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender.png} tip={Ender (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/armageddon.png} tip={Armageddon (Hyper Skill)}>

credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Equilibrium
content: Luminous has two types of skills, Light and Dark. Luminous also has a Light and Dark state that empowers skills of the same type. The state is indicated by a gauge that fills up when using skills of the same type. Before 3rd Job, filling up your gauge will alternate you between states

In 3rd Job, Luminous unlocks the skill <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium-liberation.png} tip={Equilibrium Liberation (3rd Job)}> Equilibrium Liberation that allows you to freely control when to switch over to the other state upon filling your gauge. Upon switching states, you now briefly enter the <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium state and gain the effects of both Light and Dark state and can use Equilibrium skills with no cooldowns
When in <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sunfire.png} tip={Sunfire (Beginner Skill)}> Light mode, your Light skills deal additional hits per attack and restore some %Max HP
When in <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/eclipse.png} tip={Eclipse (Beginner Skill)}> Dark mode, your Dark skills deal additional hits per attack and cost 0 MP

<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/light-affinity.png} tip={Light Affinity (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/dark-affinity.png} tip={Dark Affinity (1st Job)}> [Light and Dark Affinity]

Based on a choice you make, you can choose between Light or Dark magic to gain a passive %Final Damage boost. If you skip the beginning cutscenes, you will automatically receive <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/dark-affinity.png} tip={Dark Affinity (1st Job)}> Dark Affinity

In 4th Job, you will gain a special skill called <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/the-crossroads-of-destiny.png} tip={The Crossroads of Destiny (4th Job)}> The Crossroads of Destiny that allows you to switch between Light and Dark Affinity but has a long cooldown

primary.name: Sunfire
primary.shortDesc: Light skills deal an additional hit dealing 50% of Final Damage and restoring 1% of your base HP per cast.

primary.name: Eclipse
primary.shortDesc: Dark skills deal an additional hit proportional to the number of attacks that is 50% of final damage and use 0 MP.
details: Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect ON/OFF

primary.name: Equilibrium
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance +100% for 10 sec. When using light and dark spells, delivers an additional attack inflicting 50% of Final Damage for each hit. When Equilibrium is active, delivers an additional attack inflicting 100% of Final Damage for each hit. Ignores all cooldowns. Dark spells cost 0 MP. Light spells restore 1% of HP.\nThe total number of hits cannot exceed 15 for both Light and Dark attacks.
primary.desc: While in Equilibrium mode, you take only 1 HP damage from enemy attacks and gain 100% Knockback Resistance
details: Additionally, gain both the effects of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sunfire.png} tip={Sunfire (Beginner Skill)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/eclipse.png} tip={Eclipse (Beginner Skill)}><bp_Equilibrium skills also deal additional hits per attack_>

primary.name: Inner Light
primary.shortDesc: Willpower Lv. 20, Insight Lv. 20, INT +20, more MP increased from leveling, permanent immunity to the Darkness status.

primary.name: Flash Blink
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Teleport to a random location on the field.
primary.desc: Teleports to a random location on the map
details: If there is an enemy nearby, teleport to the nearest enemy

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/12/Lania%27s_Distress} title={"Lania's Distress"}>

primary.name: Flash Shower
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21. Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 280%.
primary.desc: Cast a piercing projectile forward

primary.name: Abyssal Drop
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 22. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Number of Attacks: 3, Damage: 107%.
primary.desc: Cast crystals that drop in front of you

primary.name: Light Speed
primary.shortDesc: Light Speed: MP Cost: 20, Horizontal Teleport: 190, Vertical Teleport: 320\nLight Leap: Consume 25 MP to jump up. Can be linked with Light Speed 1 time without a platform before landing. After learning Darkness Mastery, can also be linked during Equilibrium.\n[Passive Effects: Speed: +22, Jump: +10, Max Speed: +20]
primary.desc: Teleport in the direction you are moving with your Arrow Keys
details: Pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key together in the air will perform an Up Jump<bp_This skill can be used without a platform once before landing_>
You are briefly immune to touch damage after teleporting
Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Standard Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: 85% of damage affects MP instead of HP. If your MP reaches 0, your HP takes full damage.\n[Passive Effect: +150 Defense.]

primary.name: Mana Well
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +30%

primary.name: Light Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Increase light magic's final damage by 5%
details: You will receive either the Light or Dark version depending on your decision

primary.name: Dark Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Increase dark magic's final damage by 5%
details: You will receive either the Light or Dark version depending on your decision

primary.name: Sylvan Lance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 115%, Number of Attacks: 4.
primary.desc: Fire several homing projectiles forward

primary.name: Blinding Pillar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Distance: 350, Knockback Chance: 100%.
primary.desc: Create a pillars of light around you that pushes enemies back and has a chance to stun

primary.name: Pressure Void
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 1, Damage: 168%. Steer by holding the skill key and using Left Arrow Key,Right Arrow Key. Maximum range of 350 to the left and right.
primary.desc: Creates an orb that damages nearby enemies
details: Can be directed by pressing the Left or Right Arrow Keys

primary.name: Black Blessing
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +30, Damage Taken: -50%.

primary.name: Agile Magic
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +20

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10, Damage: +15%, Critical Rate: +20%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: Spectral Light
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 20. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 121%, Number of Attacks: 4. Steer the beams by holding the skill key and pressing Up or Down.
primary.desc: Fire a controllable beam of light
details: Can be directed by pressing the Up or Down Arrow Keys
Pressing Left or Right will change the direction you fire

primary.name: Ray of Redemption
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 41, Damage: 180%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Recovery: 800%\n[Cooldown: 5 sec]
primary.desc: Shine a beam of light in front of you that damages enemies and heals nearby party members

primary.name: Moonlight Spear
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Damage: 371%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Launch spears beneath nearby enemies

primary.name: Death Scythe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 230%, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Cooldown: 24 sec]
primary.desc: Summons two reapers from opposite sides that dash towards each other
details: During <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode, skill has no cooldown

primary.name: Shadow Shell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Ignore debilitating status conditions 7 times. Cooldown: 240 sec when broken.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Elemental Resistance by 40% and Abnormal Status Resistance by 40, Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: Creates a shell that blocks up to 7 Critical Abnormal Statuses
details: [Passive]: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance, %Elemental Resistance, and Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Dusk Guard
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +300, Ignore Damage Chance: 20%\nKnockback Resistance: +40%
primary.desc: Increases %Knockback Resistance, grants flat DEF, and a chance to ignore an enemy attack

primary.name: Photic Meditation
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 55. Duration: 180 sec. Increases you and your party members' Magic ATT by 40.

primary.name: Self Recovery
primary.shortDesc: Recovers 2.0% of Max HP and Max MP periodically.\nMP Absorb Chance: 30%, Amount Absorbed: 5% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed: 3% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Periodically restores %Max HP/MP and grants a chance for attacks to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP

primary.name: Light Speed Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Light Speed Horizontal Movement +65
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the horizontal teleport distance of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/light-speed.png} tip={Light Speed (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Equilibrium Liberation
primary.shortDesc: Can be used when the light/dark gauge is full.\nThe Equilibrium state begins upon use.\nCasting a light/dark spell without hitting an enemy changes your light/dark state by 50% of normal
primary.desc: Activate Equilibrium state when light/dark gauge is full
details: Permanently allows light/dark skill attacks that do not hit any enemies to also charge the light/dark gauge

Right-clicking the skill will toggle a function ON/OFF to automatically activate Equilibrium state when your light/dark gauge is full upon using an Equilibrium attack, <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/gate-of-light.png} tip={Gate of Light (5th Job)}>, <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/aether-conduit.png} tip={Aether Conduit (5th Job)}>, or <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/baptism-of-light-and-darkness.png} tip={Baptism of Light and Darkness (5th Job)}>

primary.name: The Crossroads of Destiny
primary.shortDesc: Cooldown: 6 hrs
primary.desc: Allows you to swap between <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/light-affinity.png} tip={Light Affinity (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/dark-affinity.png} tip={Dark Affinity (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Reflection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 81, Damage: 440%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Emit a beam of light that bounces to nearby enemies
details: Damage is reduced per each bounce of the beam

primary.name: Twilight Nova
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Max Enemies Hit: 8
Sunfire - Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 7
Eclipse - Damage: 1200%, Number of Attacks: 7
Equilibrium - Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 6, Number of Explosions: 3
Cooldown: 15 sec
[Passive Effect: Final Damage +40%, Boss Damage: +15%]
primary.desc: Create an explosion that damages surrounding enemies
details: Based on current mode, attack will have Light, Dark, or Equilibrium affinity<bp_Skill will still have a cooldown during <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode_>

primary.name: Apocalypse
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage: 340%.
primary.desc: Unleashes a burst of void energy in front of you

primary.name: Ender
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 49, Max Enemies Hit: 2. Damage: 455%, Number of Attacks: 7\nAdditional Critical rate: 100%, Additional DEF ignored: 40%\n[Cooldown: 12 sec]
primary.desc: Deals a devastating attack to up to 2 enemies
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit
During <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode, skill has no cooldown

primary.name: Dark Crescendo
primary.shortDesc: When direct skill attacks hit, there is a 80% chance to increase damage by 8% for 30 secs. Can stack up to 5 times
primary.desc: Successful direct skill attacks have a chance to grant a stacking %Damage buff

primary.name: Arcane Pitch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 85, Ignored Monster Elemental Resistance 10%, Duration: 180 sec\n[Passive: Final damage +40%, Ignore Defense: 40%, Knockback Resistance: +60%]

primary.name: Magic Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Magic ATT: +30, Critical Rate: +15%, Critical Damage: +18%
details: Now grants Magic Attack and increases %Crit Rate and %Crit Damage

primary.name: Darkness Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Equilibrium Duration: +7 sec. Time to reach Sunfire and Eclipse decreases when light or dark skills are used.\nCan use Light Speed up to 2 times in the air while Equilibrium is active.\nDeath Scythe Damage: +100%
primary.desc: Increases the duration of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode and decreases amount of skills required to reach <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sunfire.png} tip={Sunfire (Beginner Skill)}/> Light mode and <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/eclipse.png} tip={Eclipse (Beginner Skill}> Dark mode
details: During <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode, you can use <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/light-speed.png} tip={Light Speed (1st Job)}> up to 2 times in the air
Additionally increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/death-scythe.png} tip={Death Scythe (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

hyperPassive.name: Reflection - Spread
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Increases split damage reduction rate to 0%.

hyperActive.name: Equalize
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Equilibrium status begins.\nCooldown: 150 sec
hyperActive.desc: Instantly enter into <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode

hyperActive.name: Armageddon
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 3, Stun Duration: 10 sec, Invincible while casting.\nStun Duration: up to +100% depending on damage inflicted with Armageddon.\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleashes a massive explosion that binds nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Heroic Memories
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Applies to any Hero class in the party

fifthMain.name: Gate of Light
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 990%, Number of Attacks: 10\nDuration: 40 sec\nCan be used once while Equilibrium is active
fifthMain.desc: Summon a gate that damages nearby enemies
details: Can only be used only once while in Equilibrium mode

fifthMain.name: Aether Conduit
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 6 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10
Sunfire - Damage: 1155%, Number of Attacks: 4
Eclipse - Damage: 935%, Number of Attacks: 5
Equilibrium - Damage: 1100 %, Number of Attacks: 6
Critical Rate: +15% to all attacks
Cooldown: 30 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon a magic symbol that fires a stream of magic arrows
details: The attack differs depending on the state you are currently in

fifthMain.name: Baptism of Light and Darkness
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 2000, activates the Baptism of Light and Darkness 13 times consecutively. Damage: 990%, Number of Attacks: 7
Bonus Critical Rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Cooldown: 45 sec
If the Equilibrium skill hits while Equilibrium is active, Baptism of Light and Darkness Cooldown: -3 sec
When Equilibrium is activated, the cooldown of Baptism of Light and Darkness is reset once.
fifthMain.desc: Create several swords that strike down on one enemy
details: During <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode, successful Equilbrium attacks reduce the cooldown of this skill
Upon entering <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}> Equilibrium mode, the cooldown of this skill is reset
Attack has increased %100 Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Liberation Orb
fifthMain.shortDesc:
[Passive Effect]: Damage: 825%, Number of Attacks: 4, Cooldown: 6 sec, obtain up to 4 magic power per attribute. Light: creates up to 1 light zone(s) that attack up to 3 enemies. Darkness: fires magic bullets that move back and forth across up to 7 enemies.
[Active Effect]: MP Cost: 1200, Cooldown: 180 sec
Duration: 45 sec, direct skill attacks that create 10 magic orbs, each of which attack 1 enemy, attack activates up to 20 times. Additional Critical Rate: 100%, Damage increases by 165%p for each unit of accumulated magic power beyond the first. Cooldown: 0.9 sec. Imbalance: creates a magic orb that deals 1320% damage.
Balance: creates a magic orb that deals 1430% damage.
details: [Passive]: When using an attack that matches the current mode you are in, there is a chance for a special attack to trigger<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sunfire.png} tip={Sunfire (Beginner Skill)}>: Using a Light attack has a chance to create a burst of light near you that damages enemies_<tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/eclipse.png} tip={Eclipse (Beginner Skill)}>: Using a Dark attack has a chance to create a projectile that bounces to multiple enemies_Each triggered attack will accumulate 1 "Magic Power" which is used for the Active effect_Magic Power accumulated in <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/sunfire.png} tip={Sunfire (Beginner Skill)}> are separate from those obtained in <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/eclipse.png} tip={Eclipse (Beginner Skill)}>_Up to 4 Magic Power can be accumulated for both states that do not disappear until the Active effect is used_Magic Power cannot be accumulated during <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/equilibrium.png} tip={Equilibrium (Beginner Skill)}>_>

[Active]: Summons a magic orb that fires homing orbs at a single enemy each time you attack<bp_Based on the Magic Power accumulated, if the amount on both sides are equal, the attack will deal increased %Damage and is considered [Balanced], else it is [Unbalanced]_For each Magic Power accumulated, the %Damage of the orbs will be increased_Attack will target bosses and enemies with the highest Max HP_>

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/heroes/luminous/ender.png} tip={Ender (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 3, Swords of light and darkness fall and deal 695% damage up to 3 enemies 7 times.
Collision occurs up to 1 time for an enemy struck with a sword.
Critical Rate: +100%, Ignore Defense: +45%
Cooldown: 10 sec

masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 91, Max Enemies Hit: 8
Sunfire - Damage: 1630%, Number of Attacks: 7, Number of Explosions: 3

originSkill.name: Harmonic Paradox
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 3000, Active Equilibrium Duration: +10 sec, invincible during casting
Max Key-Down Duration: 3.5 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 3000%, Number of Attacks: 7, summons entity of harmony
The power of the harmonious being is released when key-down ends, bringing forth the absolute authority of truth that creates 39 explosions dealing 1538% damage to 15 enemies 7 times.
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Baptism of Light and Darkness Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Baptism of Light and Darkness Final Damage: +60%

notable.name: Baptsim of Light and Darkness - 5th Job

meta: Luminous is an INT mage class part of the Heroes class group. What is unique about Luminous is their ability to control both Light and Dark magic. The strength of Luminous' magic will shift between Light and Dark thus requiring you to alternate between both
